caption.p: Composite climate suitability map for malaria transmission for the baseline and projected 2030s. For P. vivax, new foci of transmission are visible in parts of Jammu & Kashmir, Uttarakhand and Himachal Pradesh. Increase in the number of months of TWs in northeastern states and reduction in parts of Orissa and Gujarat states are also seen. In the case of P. falciparum, few foci in Jammu & Kashmir and Uttarakhand; an increase in transmission months in northeastern states and reduction in parts of Orissa and Gujarat states are visible.
